title: Spiders
description: Do you jump when you see a spider or do you think it's cool? Spiders provides the facts so that students can decide for themselves. This nonfiction text has detailed information, including how spiders hunt, what they eat, and other interesting facts. Up-close and colorful photographs will keep students engaged in this exciting topic. This book can also be used to teach students how to identify the main idea and details in a text as well as how to summarize information.
